nodes.title: WordPress + Jamstack
nodes.excerpt: Migrating your WordPress site frontend to the Jamstack lets you keep the best parts of WordPress — the world-class content management backend — while moving your frontend development workflow to a modern stack. WordPress + the Jamstack is a win at every part of the process, from writing, to building, to using websites. This gives […]

nodes.title: Faster. Safer. Cheaper.
nodes.excerpt: Moving your WordPress frontend to the Jamstack means you keep the convenience of using WordPress’s custom backend for creating and editing content while also avoiding some of WordPress’s biggest downsides. Historically, WordPress has many downsides, including: Security — because it’s the most popular content management system in the world, hackers work hard to find and […]
